name: 沙巴克传奇
description:
The annual giant offering, the genuine license, the super-burning mobile game "Sabak Legend" shocked!
The game has innovative functions such as strategic combination, warfare and tactics, as well as sacred beasts, BOSS homes, super-explosives, 10,000-person sieges, cross-service expeditions, etc., and quickly detonate the whole service!
Do not miss passing through! What are you waiting for? This is the legendary game you are looking for!

[game features]
◆Strategic attack, super-ignition fit
Three different characteristics of the combination of skills, can be freely selected in the battlefield according to the battlefield situation; super-fired fit, super attack speed, let the battle passion!

◆ Fighting BOSS, super explosion
There are a lot of BOSS gameplay in the game, playing BOSS with the brothers to grab the equipment, experience the super high explosive rate, the thrill of crazy harvest!

◆The beast helps, the special ring is coming
The white tiger will be sent to the start, and the four great beasts will help out! V3 sent to resurrection, the five major special rings really come!

◆ Cross-service expedition, peak matchup
Three days to open cross-service, 10,000 people with the screen online; across the service to grab the site, the unified Shacheng!
